issue.title: [Python] write_dataset's file_write_options are too confusing and/or undocumented
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15139](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15139). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
ParquetFileWriteOptions / IpcFileWriteOptions / CsvFileWriteOptions are completely undocumented.

Also, creating them via the format is a little peculiar / confusing and I'm not sure why it is required.

It should be clear to the user what options they can set and how to set them.
